评论详情: very comfy to use while being lazy and cozy at the house. and if there's ever a need to go out then this can also be used for it without needing to worry about changing however you may not want to lay down in bed again after going outside lol

This jumpsuit would be good for spring and summer lounging around home or doing light yard work or flowerbeds. It is loose fitting, so will not stick to your skin when hot and sweaty and fabric is also lightweight & breathable. I have a lot of these indifferent prints and styles for that specific purpose. It could be dressed up as well with some. Cute heels,  belt and jewelry. It's almost six inches too long, but I was able to hem them to my inseam

评论概述: Stretchy in all the right places!
评论详情: I love a wide leg jumpsuit. This one is stretchy in all the right places. Easy stretch for the bodice and straps and a nice wide style pant leg. The pattern choices are awesome. Perfect style and look for spring or summer. Pair with a tank top or fitted tshirt underneath and you're dressed to impress. I always hang my jumpsuits to dry after washing, so I'll do the same with this one.
Super cute, a little short but that’s okay. I’m 5’7 and got the medium and it hits me at the top of my ankles so it would be cute with sandals. Well made, washed well and hasn’t fallen apart.

I now love rompers and jumpsuits, and this one is very different than my usual look. However, I am SO happy with it. The pattern is super cute and the fabric feels lovely. It's so comfortable to wear all day. The first day I went out in it I immediately got a compliment.

This jumpsuit stays true to Anrabess style—flattering, comfortable, and effortlessly chic. The color is just perfect and exactly what I was hoping for. I’m 5'2" and 130 lbs, and the small fits me well. The bodice is snug in all the right ways around my chest and ribcage, and the wide-leg pants drape beautifully.  The wide straps rest comfortably on my shoulders, and I love the big pockets—both functional and stylish. The pant length is spot on, letting me pair this jumpsuit with either flats or a small heel without a problem.
This jumpsuit is super comfortable and flattering.  It's true to size, and the material is soft and stretchy, without being too thin.  I would buy this again (and might in different colors).

评论概述: I need this in more colors!
评论详情: So comfortable to wear and absolutely love the wide straps. The upper material is stretchy while the attached bottoms are loose and flowing. Fabric feels light and the stitching in places gives a nice flattering look, especially for women that want to define their waist. I feel like I could lounge in this or even go to a summer bbq or evening outdoor party! So versatile! Recommend as a staple in any wardrobe. I need more now and in different colors and patterns!!

This cute jumpsuit quickly became one of my very favorites.  I wasn’t sure if I could wear the different prints well but it’s really cute and I felt looked good on me.  It’s also very comfortable and will look good with a shawl or shrug for cooler days! The Jumpsuit fit me true to size and launders well with no shrinkage of fading.  The length was also perfect.  The knit fabric is very soft and feels good next to the skin.  The jumpsuit is well made and of good quality materials.  It will hold up well.
Fits true to size, and the fabric is very comfortable. It even has pockets! The fabric design came out really well, and I can see myself wearing this a lot. I approve!

This has a flattering cut and is plenty stretchy. Pockets are awesome! Ordered a L. 5’7, 170 pounds, fits nicely, although it could be a little longer. Still, it was within the acceptable range for my height.

Normally, I wear a size medium. The size chart said to wear a size large in this jumpsuit. The large fits perfectly. It’s extremely comfortable to wear. The fabric is soft and stretchy. It’s definitely something I’m going to love to wear in the summertime. I like the wide straps. The smocking is a pretty detail. I even like the color.

Super nice cooling fabric that has lots of stretch and is kind of slinky. Like high quality, thickly woven bamboo viscose. I’m pretty sure it is mostly bambooViscose. Amazing vibrant floral print. Fits flattering and true to size.

I am 145lbs 5’6” and 34D. I got a medium and it fits good. I wish it was just a couple of inches longer, but it should be fine with some sandals or flip flops. Nice and airy for summer or spring with a cardigan. Soft material, and you don’t have to wear a bra which is nice. And of course most important is the pockets! Love the pockets!

评论概述: Stylish, Comfortable, and Perfect for Summer!
评论详情: I recently bought the ANRABESS Jumpsuit for Women and I am so impressed with how comfortable and stylish it is! This sleeveless, smocked wide-leg romper is ideal for the warm weather, offering a blend of casual elegance and ease.  Design and Fit: The jumpsuit has a flattering smocked top that fits perfectly without being too tight, providing great support and shaping. The wide-leg design is both trendy and comfortable, offering plenty of room for movement. The length is perfect for both taller and shorter individuals, and the sleeveless style makes it ideal for hot summer days. The fit is true to size, and the jumpsuit feels loose and flowy, giving it a relaxed yet chic vibe.  Fabric and Comfort: The fabric is soft and breathable, making it perfect for warm weather. It’s lightweight and feels airy on the skin, ensuring comfort all day long. The material is sturdy yet soft, so it doesn’t wrinkle easily and retains its shape even after wearing it throughout the day. I love how comfortable it is, whether I’m wearing it to a casual outing or to the beach.  Versatility: This jumpsuit is extremely versatile. It’s casual enough for day trips, errands, or lounging around, but can easily be dressed up with a nice pair of sandals or wedges for a dinner out or a special occasion. You can accessorize it with jewelry or a cute belt to make it even more stylish. The solid color options make it easy to pair with almost any accessories.  Quality and Durability: The quality of the material is excellent for the price. The stitching is strong, and the fabric holds up well even after multiple washes. It doesn’t lose its shape or color, and it’s easy to care for—just toss it in the wash, and it’s good to go.  Overall Rating: I would give the ANRABESS Jumpsuit for Women a 5/5. It’s stylish, comfortable, and perfect for summer. The combination of comfort and versatility makes it a great addition to any wardrobe, and it’s the perfect piece for staying cool and fashionable during the warmer months.

Really pretty and cute summer jumpsuit romper. Love the color with the floral print. Color is really pretty. Material is super soft, very stretchy and breathable. Can’t wait to wear it during warmer weather. Size, style, and fit as expected.

评论概述: Perfect for Summer and Stylish Vacations!
评论详情: I purchased this jumpsuit as a gift for my girlfriend, and she absolutely loves it! The smocked top gives it a flattering fit, and the wide-leg design adds an elegant, breezy vibe that’s perfect for summer or vacation outings. The fabric feels lightweight yet durable, and it looks amazing whether dressed up with accessories or worn casually. She’s already planning to wear it on our next trip! recommend for anyone looking for a comfortable yet stylish outfit.

I ordered this jumpsuit in black and in my usual size small. At 5'6" and 115 lbs., it fits me well.  The pants barely brush the tops of my feet, so the length is fine, but if you are taller or like longer pants, I suggest ordering up a size. I love the overall flowy look with the fitted smocked top, ruffled straps, and side pockets.  The strap width is perfect for covering bra straps (yay for not needing to wear a strapless bra!).  The material is soft and comfortable.  This is a go-to outfit that allows you to look cute and trendy while feeling as comfy as if you were in pajamas! I recommend this jumpsuit.

Just as pictured on Amazon, and just like the brand Anrabess, this is a really nicely made jumper.I've had very good luck with this brand, and this jumper is no different.  The weight of the fabric is sturdy enough to be called well made.  It is slinky enough to hang nicely, and thick enough to cover bumps and dimples.  The printed green is really attractive in person. The cloth is like a brushed cotton or a heavy tight knit jersey.  It is soft to the touch.Sizing, too.  I am in between a L and an XL.  I ordered L as the brand often runs amply in the size category.  I'm glad I did but probably either works.  I'm bottom heavy and this fits just nicely.  I have a winter vacation planned and I can't wait to wear this.  I may wear on plane with a denim jacket.  Adorable.  LOVE!

I can't wait to wear this as soon as spring hits! I got the green floral, and it is so comfy and fits on the body so nicely. The wide straps make it nice to wear a regular bra with. I can see this going great with a jean jacket and cute sandals. I think I'll be getting this in the other colors as well! I have quite a few pieces from Anrabess, and all have been of excellent quality at excellent price points.

The weather is a bit cold for this outfit, but it's perfect for the spring or summer. The material is soft and forgiving. It's a slight stretchy material so it's very flattering. I love how comfortable it feels. I wanted something to wear that was versatile in that it looks low key but also something I could throw a jacket on and dress it up a little bit more. My husband thought it looked super cute on me. Looked great with a pair of sandals. Definitely going to get it in a lighter color as well.

Having to endure the punishing Las Vegas weather, I am always looking for comfortable, versatile, stylish, and easy to care clothing. This jumpsuit checks all the boxes! The jumpsuit is made of 95% polyester and 5% elastane, and machine washable. This fabric is soft and stretchy. The green floral print is flattering and hides any problem areas. I especially love wearing jumpsuits in the summer to go shopping, running errands, or eating out. I am excited to wear this jumpsuit during the warmer months. (I did deduct one star because I was sent a Small even though I ordered a Medium. I can make do with the Small, but it would have been nicer to get my desired size. Also, this jumpsuit reached the bottom of my feet and I’m almost 5’3”.)
This jumpsuit is good quality and good for petite ladies.

评论概述: ANRABESS Jumpsuits for Women 2025 Summer Casual Sleeveless Smocked One Piece
评论详情: This is a very comfortable jumpsuit.  Lightweight and fit me perfectly. The material is flowy so as not to constrict you. Worth the purchase.
